and they shall <S%H7849>spread<s%> them before the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> which they have <S%H157>loved,<s%> and which they have <S%H5647>served,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> which they have <S%H1980>walked,<s%> and which they have <S%H1875>sought,<s%> and which they have <S%H7812>worshiped:<s%> they shall not be <S%H622>gathered,<s%> nor be <S%H6912>buried,<s%> they shall be for <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

<S%H4194>Death<s%> shall be <S%H977>chosen<s%> rather than <S%H2416>life<s%> by all the <S%H7611>residue<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> of this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4940>family,<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> in all the <S%H4725>places<s%> where I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H5002>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

Moreover you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Shall men <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and not <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H7725>again?<s%> Shall one turn away, and not <S%H7725>return?<s%>

Why then is this <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> slidden <S%H7725>back<s%> by a <S%H5329>perpetual<s%> <S%H4878>backsliding?<s%> they <S%H2388>hold<s%> fast <S%H8649>deceit,<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H7725>return.<s%>

I <S%H7181>listened<s%> and <S%H8085>heard,<s%> but they <S%H1696>didn't<s%> speak aright: no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5162>repents<s%> him <S%H5921>of<s%> his <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> What have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> everyone <S%H7725>turns<s%> to his <S%H4794>course,<s%> as a <S%H5483>horse<s%> that <S%H7857>rushes<s%> headlong in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H2624>Yes,<s%> the stork in the <S%H8064>sky<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> her appointed <S%H4150>times;<s%> and the <S%H8449>turtledove<s%> and the <S%H5693>swallow<s%> and the <S%H5483>crane<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H935>coming;<s%> but my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4941>law.<s%>

How do you <S%H559>say,<s%> We are <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is with <S%H403>us?<s%> But, behold, the <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5842>pen<s%> of the <S%H5608>scribes<s%> has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>

The <S%H2450>wise<s%> men are <S%H3001>disappointed,<s%> they are <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> and <S%H3920>taken:<s%> <S%H3988>behold,<s%> they have rejected the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and what kind of wisdom is in <S%H2451>them?<s%>

Therefore will I <S%H5414>give<s%> their <S%H802>wives<s%> to <S%H312>others,<s%> and their <S%H7704>fields<s%> to those who shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H6996>them:<s%> for everyone from the least even to the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> is <S%H1214>given<s%> to <S%H1215>covetousness;<s%> from the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> even to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> every one <S%H6213>deals<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>

They have <S%H7495>healed<s%> the <S%H7667>hurt<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7043>slightly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace;<s%> when there is no <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

Were they <S%H3001>ashamed<s%> when they had <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination?<s%> <S%H954>nay,<s%> they were not at all <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> neither <S%H3045>could<s%> they <S%H3637>blush:<s%> therefore shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> among those who <S%H5307>fall;<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall be cast <S%H3782>down,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I will <S%H622>utterly<s%> <S%H5486>consume<s%> <S%H5002>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> no <S%H6025>grapes<s%> shall be on the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> nor <S%H8384>figs<s%> on the fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> and the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall <S%H5034>fade;<s%> and the things that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them shall pass away from <S%H5674>them.<s%>

Why do we sit <S%H3427>still?<s%> <S%H622>Assemble<s%> <S%H935>yourselves,<s%> and let us enter into the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and let us be <S%H1826>silent<s%> <S%H3068>there;<s%> for Yahweh our <S%H430>God<s%> has put us to <S%H1826>silence,<s%> and given us <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> because we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
We <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H7965>peace,<s%> but no <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6256>came;<s%> and for a time of <S%H4832>healing,<s%> and <S%H1205>behold,<s%> dismay!

The <S%H5170>snorting<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan:<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H4684>neighing<s%> of his strong <S%H47>ones<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7493>trembles;<s%> for they have <S%H935>come,<s%> and have <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> that is in <S%H5892>it;<s%> the city and those who dwell <S%H3427>therein.<s%>

<S%H7971>For,<s%> behold, I will send <S%H5175>serpents,<s%> <S%H6848>adders,<s%> among <S%H3908>you,<s%> which will not be charmed; and they shall <S%H5391>bite<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Oh that I could <S%H4010>comfort<s%> myself against <S%H3015>sorrow!<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is faint within <S%H1742>me.<s%>

<S%H6963>Behold,<s%> the voice of the <S%H7775>cry<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> from a <S%H776>land<s%> that is very <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H3068>off:<s%> isn't Yahweh in <S%H6726>Zion?<s%> <S%H4428>Isn't<s%> her King in <S%H3707>her?<s%> Why have they provoked me to anger with their engraved <S%H6456>images,<s%> and with <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H1892>vanities?<s%>
The <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is <S%H5674>past,<s%> the <S%H7019>summer<s%> is <S%H3615>ended,<s%> and we are not <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
For the <S%H7667>hurt<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> am I <S%H7665>hurt:<s%> I <S%H6937>mourn;<s%> <S%H8047>dismay<s%> has taken hold on <S%H2388>me.<s%>

Is there no <S%H6875>balm<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead?<s%> is there no <S%H7495>physician<s%> <S%H3588>there?<s%> why then <S%H724>isn't<s%> the health of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>recovered?<s%>
